description: Curious about technology, What do I do in my spare time? Learn!

projects.title: Cancionero

projects.title: Tags
projects.description: THE app to reuse NFC cards in Home Assistant. Turn an old nfc-enabled smartphone into a nfc reader for Home Assistant.

projects.title: telegram-db-backup
projects.description: Docker Container to backup MySQL/MariaDB to a *.sql.zip file to a Telegram Bot Chat.

projects.title: altserver
projects.description: AltServer with nextmuxd docker-compose convenience scripts.

projects.title: z2m-mqtt-keyboard
projects.description: Use your zigbee2mqtt devices to control your computer. Maps a button from device to a keyboard key or key combo.

projects.description: Simple OWM weather provider for Gadgetbridge.
